Name: Jade Chamber
Title: Stargazing Amidst Clouds
Desc: "They say that it contains a thousand dazzling jewels."
Source: Reward for accepting Bu'yun's Adventure Challenge in the open world and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Jade Chamber
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Roll Phase</color>: 2 initial Elemental Dice will be of the same Elemental type as your active character.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When Action Phase begins:</color> If you have no more than 3 cards in your Hand, discard this card and create 1 $[K411].

K411.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color>
K411.Desc: The {SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element can be considered as any kind of element, and can be used to pay for costs of various kinds.
